_header: The wise man the fire shall beat
Subjects: governance; servants, advice to; servants, instructions to
_description: On good governance of a household — three couplets

NottsULMeLm1.Transcription:
The wyse man the fuyr schal beteMan glad & mery gestes shal
                    kepeThe sturne man Styward of halleto reheyte the gestes alleThe
                    boteler neyder to scars nor to freThis shal gode houshold gouernede
                    be
